lead_paragraph: It took just four days for Hillary Clinton's newly minted running mate, Sen. Tim Kaine, to drop the t-word.

headline.main: VP Nominee Tim Kaine Urges Voters to Trust Hillary Clinton
headline.print_headline: VP Nominee Tim Kaine Urges Voters to Trust Hillary Clinton
